Class ToDoController<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ToDoController<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListADT<E>

    public class ToDoController<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListADT<E>
    ToDoController class is a generic class that creates an abstract data type list using either an array-based list or a link-based list.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: ListADT
        Remove all contents from the list, so it is once again empty. Client is responsible for reclaiming storage used by the list elements.
